title: ZOS: Zone of Separation - Season 1 (War Drama)
description:
ZOS: Zone of Separation is a Canadian television drama mini-series, co-executive produced by Paul Gross. It is an eight-part Canadian original drama mini-series about the life and death struggle to enforce a U.N.-brokered ceasefire in the fictional, Sarajevo-like town of Jadac.

Unarmed military observers try to defuse crises and maintain the fragile ceasefire between the Christians and Muslims. They move between the rival factions, facing distrust and dangerous situations. Even the armed U.N. soldiers that have arrived in town to maintain order by any means necessary are not entirely on their side. The series details the dangers and apparent futilities of living in a violent peacekeeping zone, as well as the psychological and physical costs to the peacekeepers who attempt to remain neutral.

Michelle Nolden as Sean Kuzak 
Colm Meaney as George Titac 
Lolita Davidovich as Mila Michailov 
Rick Roberts as Maj. Gavin Hart 
Enrico Colantoni as Speedo Boy 
Allan Hawco as Capt. Mick Graham
